title: The Comey Report Drops (Ep 1055)
description:
In this episode, I address the explosion of fake news this week and what I think is going on behind the scenes to catch the leakers. I also discuss troubling revelations in the recently dropped Comey report which paint a really bad picture about his activities. News Picks:Is the US Intel community dragging its feet on the Russiagate files?

 

The Comey IG report drops. It isn’t pretty.

 

Is President Trump preparing to declassify these three explosive files?

 

Is this MSNBC host about to get sued for defaming the President?

 

The Washington Post blows it, again. 

 

Is it immoral to hand off to our children nearly 100 trillion in debt?

 

Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
